articles.author: Amy Croffey, Christian Edwards, James Legge, Catherine Nicholls, Emmanuel Miculita
articles.title: Andrew Tate and brother arrive in Florida after leaving Romania, spokesperson says - CNN
articles.description: Andrew Tate, a self-proclaimed misogynist who has become a cause célèbre on the American right, and his brother were allowed to leave Romania where they face charges including rape and human trafficking, after the US reportedly applied pressure to ease travel…
articles.content: Right-wing influencer Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan have landed in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, after leaving Romania on a private jet Thursday, according to Mateea Petrescu, the brothers spokespe… [+5560 chars]

articles.author: Tim Harlow, Tim Harlow
articles.title: ‘Economic blackout’ campaign encourages Americans to boycott shopping on Friday - Star Tribune
articles.description: The man behind the campaign says, “We are the economy.” Future initiatives are planned.
articles.content: A grassroots campaign spreading across social media is encouraging Americans to refrain from shopping at major retailers on Friday to send a message to corporations and politicians that they are fed … [+1302 chars]
